description: This video features Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter Julie Cart explaining what happens when California—a state that is responsible for about 1 percent of the world's greenhouse gases—goes all-in on climate change.
title: CALmatters Explains: California's War on Climate Change
title_page: CALmatters Explains: California's War on Climate Change | CALmatters
text:
CALmatters Explains: California’s War on Climate Change CALmatters.org environment reporter Julie Cart explains California’s War on Climate change
California is leading the country in efforts to combat climate change—and upped the ante again today as Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation requiring California to derive all of its electricity from clean energy sources by 2045. This explainer looks at what happens when a state responsible for about 1 percent of the world’s greenhouse gases goes all-in to fight climate change.
